title.narrative: SSC maritime sector, Ghana - Phase II

description.narrative:
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on Maritime affairs aims at improving the framework conditions for the maritime sector, which contributes to favorable prerequisites for free competition and an international maritime level playing field that benefits both Ghana and Denmark by:
-Improving Ghana’s compliance with IMO regulation by building and implementing a quality unit. -Improving Ghana’s the maritime safety in the Port of Tema by ensuring safe and efficient tug boat operations. -Increasing Ghana’s has increased its Maritime Domain Awareness. -Strengthening framework conditions in the Ghanaian maritime sector. -Improving regional cooperation and relations on IMO compliance and Maritime Domain Awareness.

title.narrative: Not applicable as baseline, impact indicators are not defined for current SSC projects.
